title: palumAru ninu
sahitya:
palumAru ninu nE dalaci pilicitinani alusAyenA hari


anupallavi

  kali balimilO balu vetala tALalEka alasitinaiyA harI


caraNam 1    nidhicAla gala pennidhivani gAdurA sannidhi entO madhuramurA hari
    caraNam 2    muraLIgAna mahO marala marala vini vini paravayincenu parimaLincenurA hari
